00497     enum AusgabCall {
00498         BeforeTransport = 0,     
00499         EgsCut = 1,              
00500         PegsCut = 2,             
00501         UserDiscard = 3,         
00502         ExtraEnergy = 4,

00508         AfterMoller = 9,

00514         AfterAnnihRest = 14,

00564     inline int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00565                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed) {
00566 
00567         geometry->resetErrorFlag();
00568         EGS_Float twant = t;
00569         int inew = geometry->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed);
00570         storeGeometryStep(ireg,inew,x,u,twant,t);
00571         if( geometry->getLastError() ) reportGeometryError();
00572         return inew;
00573 
00574         //return geometry->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed);
00575     };
00576 
00581     inline EGS_Float hownear(int ireg,const EGS_Vector &x) {
00582         return geometry->hownear(ireg,x);
00583     };

01004 
01005 #define APP_MAIN(app_name) \
01006     int main(int argc, char **argv) { \
01007         app_name app(argc,argv); \
01008         int err = app.initSimulation(); \
01009         if( err ) return err; \
01010         err = app.runSimulation(); \
01011         if( err < 0 ) return err; \
01012         return app.finishSimulation(); \
01013     }
01014 
01015 #define APP_SIMPLE_MAIN(app_name) \
01016     int main(int argc, char **argv) { \
01017         app_name app(argc,argv); \
01018         app.run(); \
01019         app.reportResults(); \
01020         app.finish(); \
01021         return 0; \
01022     }
01023 
01024 #define APP_LIB(app_name) \
01025     extern "C" {\
01026         APP_EXPORT EGS_Application* createApplication(int argc, char **argv) {\
01027             return new app_name(argc,argv);\
01028         }\
01029     }
01030
